recipesJson.name: TIA SANDIA (Watermelon girl)
recipesJson.author: Fertox
recipesJson.description: Fresh and sweet watermelon wrapped with strawberry flavor at the end. A light and refreshing vape for all sunny days.

reviews.text: Great tasting strawberry with a watermelon body. Menthol was a bit too strong to my liking but great tasting vape.
